mission.posting: Grimace likes to help others out, but she wants your help. A rather nasty piece of work is bullying a lot of other people, she needs your hacking skills to help her get even with the bully.

email.subject: The Middle Man
email.body:
Hey #PLAYERNAME#,
There is a rather nasty kid who is bullying a lot of other kids online. I'd like your help to get back at him. I've managed to forge a piece of evidence that is going to get him into a lot of trouble. But I need your help to deploy it. When you are ready I've linked you to my server with an account below. Once you're in download the file "evidence.docx"
Once you have the file you should have no trouble penetrating the bully's security. Once through just upload the file into his HOME folder. Make sure you clear the logs afterwards though. We don't want any evidence pointing to someone else now do we?
BATTLEBOARD REMINDER: When you have completed Grim4ce's task she will become an official member of your team.

attachments.note: Download "evidence.docx" from Grim4ce's server. Once downloaded, upload it to the bully's home folder.
